channel.title: Whonix destroyed after autoremove
channel.description:
Hi,
I ran apt-get autoremove in the terminal and can not use my Whonix anymore. Whenever I run a command (like update, starting a program etc.) it gives me a 251 error "command not found". All programs are gone. Tor not running. Dolphin not working. Can move files within the terminal but thats it.
Anyone can help me? I would like to get some stuff from this distribution. I have not backed up everything. It is a pity.
Thanks!

item.title: Whonix destroyed after autoremove
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
You probably uninstalled a meta package (by uninstalling a package
Whonix “depends” on) and then run autoremove. To prevent this from
happening again, read this:

Whonix

Whonix Debian Packages

Which Whonix Debian packages are safe to remove? What is a meta package? What other packages do Whonix meta packages install? Which packages should ne...

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix destroyed after autoremove
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Hi UserS

Can you use the konsole to transfer the files you need to your host, usb, or other whonix-workstation?

Whonix

File Transfer

Copying files into and out of Whonix Virtual Machines.

item.title: Whonix destroyed after autoremove
item.dc:creator: UserS
item.description:
Hi,

I ran apt-get autoremove in the terminal and can not use my Whonix anymore. Whenever I run a command (like update, starting a program etc.) it gives me a 251 error “command not found”. All programs are gone. Tor not running. Dolphin not working. Can move files within the terminal but thats it.

Anyone can help me? I would like to get some stuff from this distribution. I have not backed up everything. It is a pity.
